privacy.headerDescription: Your privacy is fundamental to Hogu. Here we clearly explain how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

controller.title: 1. Data Controller
controller.description: The data controller is Hogu Services Corporation, with registered office at 1200 Brickell Avenue, Suite 310, 33131 Miami FL.

collectedData.title: 2. Types of Data Collected
collectedData.userData: User Data: name, surname, VAT number or Tax Code, phone, date of birth, email, encrypted/hashed password, and last login information.
collectedData.bookingData: Booking Data: information related to booked services (Restaurant, B&B, Club, NCC, Luggage).
collectedData.paymentData: Payment Data: transaction data managed by Stripe or PayPal. Hogu does not store full card details.
collectedData.geoData: Geolocation Data: address provided by the user, used to calculate an approximate location via external APIs. No GPS tracking without consent.

purposes.title: 3. Purpose of Processing
purposes.serviceManagement: Provision of services and management of bookings
purposes.accountCommunication: Operational communications regarding account and bookings
purposes.legalCompliance: Fulfillment of legal and tax obligations
purposes.security: Security, fraud prevention, and account protection
purposes.ageRestriction: The service is intended exclusively for adult users.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis of Processing
legalBasis.legitimateInterest: Legitimate interest for security and fraud prevention (art. 6.1.f GDPR)

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: Data may be shared with service providers (e.g., restaurants, NCC), site administrators, and third-party processors appointed as Data Processors.

extraEU.title: Transfers Outside the EU
extraEU.description: Some providers (Stripe, PayPal, email services, Cloudflare) may process data outside the EU. Transfers are made via Standard Contractual Clauses.

dataRetention.title: 5. Data Retention
dataRetention.accountData: Account data: until deletion or suspension

cookies.title: 7. Cookie Policy
cookies.description: The site only uses technical cookies necessary for functionality and access.

header.title: Terms and Conditions
header.description: These Terms govern the use of the Hogu platform by consumers and Providers.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using the Hogu platform, the user declares to have read, understood, and fully accepted these Terms and Conditions. The Terms apply to both consumers and professional users, as well as Providers using the platform.
acceptance.additional: Any changes to the Terms will be communicated via email. If the user does not wish to accept them, they may stop using the service and delete their account.

platformRole.title: 2. Platform Role
platformRole.description: Hogu acts as a technological and commercial intermediary between users and third-party service providers (“Providers”), such as restaurants, clubs, NCCs, lodging, and luggage services.
platformRole.additional: The contract for the final service is concluded directly between the user and the Provider. Hogu is not a party to the service contract.

account.title: 3. Account and Security
account.description: The user is responsible for the correct management of their account and access credentials.
account.additional: Hogu may suspend or close the account, even without notice, in case of Terms violations, fraudulent use, or illegal activities. In such cases, the user will receive an email specifying the reasons.

bookingPayment.title: 4. Bookings, Payments, and Withdrawal
bookingPayment.description: Payments made by the user finalize the booking. Hogu collects payments on behalf of the Providers and transfers the amounts due net of applicable commissions.
bookingPayment.recession: Pursuant to art. 59 of the Consumer Code, the right of withdrawal is excluded for services with a specific execution date or period, such as restaurants, transport, events, NCC services, luggage, and lodging.
bookingPayment.cancellation: Cancellation or refund requests are governed solely by the Provider's policies and will only be accepted with their approval, except in cases of serious anomalies or failures attributable to the Provider.

billing.title: 5. Billing and Commissions
billing.description: Billing varies depending on the booked service:
list: For restaurant services, Hogu issues an invoice exclusively to the Provider for the commissions due, calculated as a fixed amount per booked cover;

For Club, B&B, NCC, and Luggage services, Hogu issues an invoice directly to the end user for the purchased service and to the Provider for the applied commissions, equal to 8% of the total booking value.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Hogu is not responsible for non-performance, quality, or proper execution of services provided by Providers. Hogu’s liability remains unaffected in cases of fraud, gross negligence, or for the non-derogable rights granted to consumers by law.

availability.title: 7. Service Availability
availability.description: Hogu does not guarantee continuous platform availability, which may be temporarily suspended for maintenance, updates, or urgent technical interventions.

law.title: 8. Applicable Law and Language
law.description: These Terms are governed by Italian law. In case of translations or versions in other languages, the Italian version prevails.

payment.failed_reason: Reason: Insufficient funds or card declined by the bank.
payment.contact_support: If the problem persists, contact your bank or HOGU support.

payment_summary.payment_info: By clicking "Proceed to Payment" you will be redirected to the secure platform to complete the transaction. We do not store your card details.

password_reset.password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters.
password_reset.reset_failed: Invalid or expired code, or invalid password.
